abstract.t: RFC 9280 specifies version 3 of the RFC Editor Model. Since its publication, lessons have been learned about implementing this model. This document lists some of those lessons learned and updates RFC 9280 based on that experience. It can be considered version 4 of that model. There is a repository for this draft at https://github.com/ paulehoffman/9280-updates (https://github.com/ paulehoffman/9280-updates).
